steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "pain"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Pharmacokinetics report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Pharmacokinetics" on page 'Results'
Dataset "Pharmacokinetics" is selected on page 'Results'
I verify only "Compact" view is available
I select 25 in Per page dropdown
I verify displayed data count in 'Compact view' is equal to 25
I click "2" pagination link on the top pagination
the pagination link "2" is displayed as current in top pagination
I click on link 'Export' on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Text 'Export is not currently available for this content.' is displayedon pop-up 'Search and Alerts'

steps.title: Text "Export is not currently available for this content." is displayed on pop-up 'export'
I click 'Ok' on pop up 'Export is not available'
I click "1" pagination link on the top pagination
I apply filter "Paracetamol" from "Administered Bioactive" filter set under "Pharmacokinetics" dataset
the results table header should contain the filter applied "Paracetamol"

substeps.message: Filter Counts and Results Count are Matching

steps.title: I verify if filter count is matching the results count

substeps.message: [Header of results] Displayed applied filters: null

steps.title: there should not be applied filters after the user clicks link 'Clear' in filters group "Administered Bioactive"
I click 'Show all filters' filter link for "Administration Route" filter menu on the Search Results page
the modal form 'Show all filters' should be displayed on Search Results page
the tab "Administration Route" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page
I select the filter view "Alphabetical" in the modal form 'Show all filters'

substeps.message: The Alphabeticalis Disaplyed displayed in the panel

steps.title: Verify selected "Alphabetical" filterview is Displayed
